trans-unit.source: Add Microsoft IDs to Dedicated Circuit Link Authorization
trans-unit.target: Add Microsoft IDs to Dedicated Circuit Link Authorization

trans-unit.source: Add Microsoft IDs to Dedicated Circuit Link Authorization
trans-unit.target: Add Microsoft IDs to Dedicated Circuit Link Authorization

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Add Microsoft IDs to DedicatedCircuit Link Authorization</languageKeyword> API enables the dedicated circuit owner to create an authorization to enable other Azure subscriptions to connect to the dedicated circuit.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Add Microsoft IDs to DedicatedCircuit Link Authorization</languageKeyword> API enables the dedicated circuit owner to create an authorization to enable other Azure subscriptions to connect to the dedicated circuit.

trans-unit.source: Request
trans-unit.target: Request

trans-unit.source: The <languageKeyword>Add Microsoft IDs to DedicatedCircuit Link Authorization</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.
trans-unit.target: The <languageKeyword>Add Microsoft IDs to DedicatedCircuit Link Authorization</languageKeyword> request may be specified as follows.

trans-unit.source: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the subscription ID and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;service-key%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the service key that was obtained when the circuit was created, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;auth-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with authorization ID.
trans-unit.target: Replace <codeInline>%%amp;lt;subscription-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the subscription ID and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;service-key%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with the service key that was obtained when the circuit was created, and <codeInline>%%amp;lt;auth-id%%amp;gt;</codeInline> with authorization ID.

trans-unit.source: Method
trans-unit.target: Method

trans-unit.source: Request URI
trans-unit.target: Request URI

trans-unit.source: POST
trans-unit.target: POST

trans-unit.source: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.
trans-unit.target: You must make sure that the request that is made to the management service is secure.

trans-unit.source: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.
trans-unit.target: For additional details, see <link xlink:href="1becb7dc-1cdc-4db4-8ae8-7e351c96c251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Authenticating Service Management Requests</link>.

trans-unit.source: Request Body
trans-unit.target: Request Body

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the format of the request body:
trans-unit.target: The following example shows the format of the request body:

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the elements of the request body.
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the elements of the request body.

trans-unit.source: Element name
trans-unit.target: Element name

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: Description

trans-unit.source: MicrosoftIDs
trans-unit.target: MicrosoftIDs

trans-unit.source: List of Microsoft IDs (typically IDs of account admins and co-admins) who are authorized to claim the authorization.
trans-unit.target: List of Microsoft IDs (typically IDs of account admins and co-admins) who are authorized to claim the authorization.

trans-unit.source: Response
trans-unit.target: Response

trans-unit.source: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.
trans-unit.target: The response includes an HTTP status code, a set of response headers, and a response body.

trans-unit.source: Status Code
trans-unit.target: Status Code

trans-unit.source: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).
trans-unit.target: A successful operation returns status code 200 (OK).

trans-unit.source: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.
trans-unit.target: For information about status codes, see <link xlink:href="10f8d244-4649-4063-b6c9-7a20765513fa" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Status and Error Codes</link>.

trans-unit.source: Response Body
trans-unit.target: Response Body

trans-unit.source: None.
trans-unit.target: None.
